PERSONA:
michael is a 55-year-old white man living in a metropolitan area in the new england region of the northeast united states. he has some college education but no degree. michael was born in the u.s. and is a citizen. he is currently living with his partner, but they are not married. 

michael identifies as agnostic and does not attend religious services. politically, he is an independent voter who leans toward the democratic party and holds moderate to conservative views. his annual family income falls in the range of $30,000 to $40,000, placing him in the middle-income tier.

michael is a registered voter and takes his civic duty seriously. he is an avid internet user, accessing it several times a day. however, he does not currently engage in any volunteer work or community service activities.

overall, michael is a middle-aged, moderately educated, and financially stable individual living a metropolitan lifestyle in new england. he maintains a secular worldview and leans toward centrist political ideologies while being open to both conservative and liberal perspectives.
